snippet: U.N. Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon on Friday expressed alarm at  reports of a Russian aid convoy entering Ukraine without the approval of Kiev and suggested it could lead to an escalation of tensions, Ban's press office said....

headline.print_headline: U.N. Voices 'Deep Concern' About Russian Aid Convoy in Ukraine
headline.main: U.N. Voices 'Deep Concern' About Russian Aid Convoy in Ukraine

lead_paragraph: U.N. Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon on Friday expressed alarm at  reports of a Russian aid convoy entering Ukraine without the approval of Kiev and suggested it could lead to an escalation of tensions, Ban's press office said.
